name: Mom Says its my Turn to Pilot the Spaceship
name_original: Mom Says its my Turn to Pilot the Spaceship
description:
Backstory - Your younger sibling DEMANDED a turn piloting your spaceship while you were navigating through an asteroid field, now you're stuck on the gun. How long can you stall the inevitable...

Credits - This game was made in 3 days. Every part was created entirely by me including art, sounds and music, which is why I added a mute button for the music. The color palette used was made by sukinapan on Lospec. Music was created with Soundation. Sound effects were created with jsfxr.
